Package com.hexaforce.warzone.models

Class Blockade

java.lang.Object
com.hexaforce.warzone.models.Blockade
All Implemented Interfaces:
Card, Order
public class Blockade extends Object implements Card
This class represents the implementation of a Blockade order. Blockade cards are used to change one of your territories into a neutral territory and triple the number of armies on that territory.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Blockade(Player p_playerInitiator, String p_targetCountry)
    Initializes a Blockade order with the player owning the card and the target country.
